clang-analyzer-optin.cplusplus.Uninitial.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-optin.cplusplus.UninitializedObject
Reports uninitialized fields after object construction.
The
clang-analyzer-optin.cplusplus.UninitializedObject
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-optin.cplusplus.Uninitial.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
